desc: Rotaeno screen stabilization tool based on HTML5 + Canvas
previewDesc: You can see real-time rotation parameters and effects
recordDesc: Process your recording and export a new video
browserWarn: Due to limitations of browser APIs, performance, and compatibility issues on different platforms, rendering effects may not be optimal.
clickSelectVideo: Click here to select your video.
mergeAudioDesc: Merge the processed video and audio
encoderNotSupport: Your browser does not support any of the following encoders (h264, vp9, vp8)
compatibilityWarningInfo: The video frame rate is: {{fps}}, which is too low. This may be due to browser compatibility issues. Try using FFmpeg...
lowPerformance: Your device may not have sufficient performance to process properly. Please use the Python version for processing.
browserRecommendPC: PC: It is recommended to use Chrome or a browser with Chromium kernel. FireFox may have compatibility issues.
browserRecommendAndroid: Android: It is recommended to use Chrome or Edge. Android WebView and FireFox may have compatibility issues.
browserRecommendIOS: iOS: Due to Safari only supporting VP8 encoding, the effect may not be ideal.
